name: BinomialBlurImageFilter

members.name: Repetitions
members.detaileddescriptionSet: Get and set the number of times to repeat the filter.
members.detaileddescriptionGet: Get and set the number of times to repeat the filter.

briefdescription: Performs a separable blur on each dimension of an image.
detaileddescription:
The binomial blur consists of a nearest neighbor average along each image dimension. The net result after n-iterations approaches convultion with a gaussian.

\li All Examples
